message: This offer benefits us both. Take it while it's still a good deal for you, Alice!
Come on, Bob! Let's find a middle ground.
Okay, Alice, let's be realistic. This is a good offer considering the inflation. Don't miss out!
Don't think you're getting away that easily, Bob!
Alice, the clock is ticking and your money is shrinking. This is my final offer, take it or leave it!
I'm not giving up yet, Bob! You're going to have to do better than that!
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. Accept this offer now or we both lose!
I'll take my chances, Bob. You're not getting the upper hand!
